auth.msg.error_sign_in: Error, please check your username or password
auth.msg.token_send: Token has been sent to your email
auth.msg.error_max_failed_two_factor: Sorry, you've exceeded the maximum failed attempt to enter the valid token. Please try again in {{data}} minutes.
auth.msg.error_max_failed_login: Sorry, you've exceeded the maximum failed attempt to log in. Please try again in {{data}} minutes.
auth.msg.invalid_body: Hi, you are currently signed in as {{name}}.
auth.please_confirm: Please confirm your account by entering the authentication code that we've sent to you
auth.please_auth_with_google: Please enter the verification code that your Google Authenticator app has created.
app.alert.msg.alert_saved.error: Error, failed when saving alert configuration data
app.alert.msg.alert_saved: Alerts configuration data has been saved
app.health.description: Here you can set LogBook to send a GET request to your app, where the installed LogBook client package in your app will return some health-check info. Read here for more info
app.health.hint.base_url: Write your application base URL, for example "http://your-app.com" without the slash character at the end.
app.hint.from_name: The name which email messages will be sent from.
app.hint.from_email: The email address which email messages will be sent from.
app.hint.type: for more details on how to configure LogBook client/plugin for your app.
app.hint.roles: for more info regarding these roles.
app.msg.app_saved.error: Error, failed when saving app data
app.msg.generate_api_key: Are you sure to regenerate a new API key for this app?
app.msg.health_status_saved.error: Error, failed when saving the health status
app.msg.notif-email.error: Error, failed when saving email notification
app.msg.team_save.error: Error, failed when saving team data
app.notification.email_subtitle: Configure the outgoing email provider for sending notifications through email.
app.title: LogBook
app.warning_app: Warning: by clicking the following Delete button, all of the app's related data such as settings, logs, alerts configuration, and so on will be permanently deleted.
app.health_dialog_cache_description: Check whether your application caches are working properly or not.
app.health_dialog_cpu_monitor: Monitors the Unix CPU load number from your app's server as defined
app.health_dialog_default_description: By default, three numbers will be provided by your app's server:
app.health_dialog_alert_conditions: You can specify LogBook alerts condition :
app.health_dialog_alert_conditions_faile: when the check is failed in your app's server, or when the value of the CPU load above is equals or more than a given number.
app.health_dialog_database_description: Check whether your application's database is accessible, while also checking the storage size being used in MB.
app.health_dialog_database_description_f: You can specify LogBook alerts condition when this type of check is failed, or when your app's database size is equals or more than the given amount (in MB).
app.health_dialog_ram_description: Check the amount of RAM being used in your app's server in MB.
app.health_dialog_ram_conditions: You can set LogBook alerts condition when this type of check is failed, or when the reported RAM usage is equals or more than the given amount (in MB).
app.health_dialog_used_disk_description: Check the amount of used disk space in percentage.
app.health_dialog_used_disk_conditions: You can set LogBook alerts condition when this type of check is failed, or when the used disk space is equals or more than the given amount (in percentage, without "%" sign).
auto-refresh.health_logs_subtitle: Automatically refresh Logs and Health Status data (if currently visible) within the given time interval.
auto-refresh.message_subtitle: Automatically refresh Messages within the given time interval.
common.logo.error: Sorry, failed while loading the logo
common.log_input_tags: Type and press Enter to add more tags
common.msg.unauthorized_page: Sorry, you are not allowed to access this page
common.msg.delete: Are you sure to delete this?
common.msg.delete_app: Please enter the application name before deleting it:
common.msg.error.updated_api_key: Error, failed while updating the API key
common.msg.copy_apikey: API key has been copied to the clipboard
common.msg.auto_refresh_saved.error: Error, failed when saving the auto refresh setting
common.msg.auto_refresh_saved: Auto refresh setting has been saved
common.msg.restricted_access_app_page: Sorry, your team(s) was not registered to any app yet. Please contact your LogBook admin.
common.msg.restricted_access_team_page: Sorry, you were not assigned to any team yet. Please contact your team manager.
common.max_login: Max failed attempts for signing in
common.maxDate_errors: Maximum search date range is 1 month
common.name: Name
common.subtitle_filter: Optional : you can also define text-based filters (case insensitive) in the following log attributes. For example, you write "Critical exception" inside "Message" attributes which will make only those logs having "Critical exception" text inside their message to be notified later on.
common.send_notification: Send notification when the following condition are met
common.waiting_time: Waiting time for failed sign in attempt
common.write_your_comment: Write your comment and press Enter to save...
errors.field.invalid_password: Invalid format: at least 8 characters with 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, and 1 number
errors.fields.invalid_url: This value is not a valid URL
error.msg.error_while_loading_app_log_da: Error while loading detail log data
error.msg.error_while_loading_log_view_d: Error while loading view log data
header.first_configure_email_smtp: Please configure the global SMTP settings first in order for LogBook to be able to work properly.
hint.alert.health_signal.how_many_times: How many times for missing health status within specified duration.
hint.alert.health_signal.with_in_duratio: Specific duration (in minutes) to determine a missing health status.
hint.alert.notification_limit: Maximum number of notification(s) that will be sent for this alert in a single day.
hint.alert.notify: Send the notification to the following role of a team.
hint.alert.logs.with_in_duration_of: Duration window (in minutes) that the logs with specified conditions here are being sent into LogBook.
hint.alert.logs.how_many_times: How many times the logs that meet conditions specified here are arrived within specified duration.
hint.delay_to_resend: How long users should wait before they are allowed to request for 2FA code again (in minutes).
hint.enable_two_factor: Enforce extra layer of security by forcing a global two-factor authentication (email-based token and Google Authenticator) to all users
hint.max_failed: Number of maximum attempts a user is allowed to enter wrong 2FA codes, before the user is blacklisted temporarily.
hint.max_resend: Number of maximum attempts a user is allowed to request for a new 2FA codes.
hint.max_login: Number of maximum attempts a user is allowed to enter a wrong credential, before the user is being blacklisted temporarily.
hint.waiting_time: How long users should wait in minutes, before they are able to sign in again after several failed attempts
images.upload.file_size_exceeds: Maximum size for logo is 2 MB
message.to_many_messages: Too many messages! View here instead
mail.enter_token: Please enter the token that we've sent to {{email}}
mail.settings_confirm_intro: Please set an e-mail address where LogBook will send a confirmation token using the given SMTP settings. The token will have to be entered manually in the next step in order to have a valid and working SMTP settings.
mail.msg.connection_is_valid: The mail connection has been validated and saved
mail.msg.connection_not_valid: Error, failed while validating the SMTP connection
mail.msg.close_validation_dialog: Token validation is a mandatory process in order for LogBook to be able to save a valid SMTP settings. Are you sure to cancel it?
mail.msg.error_smtp_connection: Error, failed while checking the SMTP connection
mail.msg.send_token_to_recipient:
The test message to "recipient_email" has been queued. 
 Please wait a few moments before the message arrives
password.msg.success_body: You can close this page then sign in by using the new password.
password.msg.invalid_body: The link is invalid or user was not found.
reset.intro: Enter your email address and we will send you a message with link to reset your password
reset.msg.invalid_username_email: Sorry, we could not find any user with the given email
reset.msg.success: Please check your email for the reset password link
reset.msg.success_title: Reset password request has been sent
setting.global_setting_subtitle: Global SMTP settings for sending notifications through email.
setting.msg.security_setting_save.error: Error, failed when saving security setting
setting.msg.general_setting_save.error: Error, failed when saving general setting
setting.msg.enable_two_fa_authenticator: You are about to disable global 2FA settings, both for email-based token and Google Authenticator option. Are you sure?
team.msg.delete_error: Sorry, deletion is not allowed because Team has been assigned to one or more apps.
team.msg.team_save_error: Error, failed when saving team data
team.msg.last_one: Team must have at least one "Team - manager" role
team.no_assigned_apps: No assigned apps yet for this team.
team.subtitle_create: Set one or more teams that are responsible for this app. Each member will be able to get app-specific notifications, and be allowed to view the app details or to modify settings when they have "Team - manager" role.
users.hint.password: At least 8 characters with 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, and 1 number
users.google_auth_enable: Enable Two-Factor Google Authenticator for your account.
users.scan_me: Scan the QR code by using your Google Authenticator app to get the OTP token, then use the code in the following field.
user.msg.delete_error: Sorry, you can't delete the user since he/she is currently the only Team-manager in {{data}}.
user.msg.disable_google_authenticator: Are you sure to disable Google Authenticator for this user's two-factor authentication method?
user.msg.error_google_auth_active: Error, failed when enabled Google Authenticator
user.msg.error_google_auth_inactive: Error, failed when disabled Google Authenticator
user.msg.google_auth_inactive: Google Authenticator for 2FA has been disabled
user.msg.google_auth_active: Google Authenticator for 2FA has been enabled
